modName: TDN Followers - Snow Elf Mage Follower - Lester
summary: Mod adds a new standalone follower to the game, Snow elf mage, named Lester.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://s017.radikal.ru/i415/1408/52/48ffebe81db2.png[/img]
[img]http://s52.radikal.ru/i138/1408/ae/e2d9e2421ece.png[/img]
Mod adds a new standalone follower to the game, Snow elf mage, named Lester.
~~~~~~~
[img]http://s16.radikal.ru/i190/1408/57/8cec11108304.jpg[/img]
~~~~~~~
Lester is essential and marriageable. He has unique set of equipment.
He can be found in Whiterun, at The Bannered Mare.
Lester has his own unique spell, he can summon two ice wraiths, named Snowy and Frosty.

[size=4][b]v.1.1:[/b][/size]

- Removed warpaint because it didn't look right.
- Reworked the face textures.
- Most of the spells were customized. His spells no longer cause damage to player.
- Summoned monsters no longer attack the player.
- Added staff with custom enchantment which doesn't apply to player too.
- With 100 Conjuration skill Lester can summon a unique Frost Atronach. The Atronach cannot be summoned in interiors. Both the Atronach and a Wraiths can be summoned at the same time while outdoors.
- Added Waterwalking ability.
- Various minor fixes.
- Cleaned the mod with TES5Edit.

[size=4]v.1.3:[/size]
- Now Lester's hood will be automatically unequipped in interiors and equipped outdoors.
- Added high poly head instead of the old one.
- Fixed racial restrictions, now you can equip any armor on him.


[b]Requirements:[/b]
Skyrim version 1.9.32.0
DLC Dawnguard

[img]http://s019.radikal.ru/i639/1408/f6/0a0a8eb0675b.png[/img]
(Manually)
Place mod's files to your Data folder. Activate FalmerLester.esp in the game launcher.
[img]http://i011.radikal.ru/1408/61/5d4e79b824c8.png[/img]
(Manually)
Dismiss Lester as your follower. Save game.
Then remove files from following folders
-Data/FalmerLester.esp
-Data/meshes/LESTER
-Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/FalmerLester.esp
-Data/textures/LESTER
-Data/textures/actors/character/facegendata/FaceTint/FalmerLester.esp
[img]http://s005.radikal.ru/i209/1408/69/dc153bc598fa.png[/img]
Bethesda for Skyrim
Geonox for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?]Face textures[/url]
Urshi for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145/?]Smooth Male Body[/url]
His subcredit list includes:
Imperator3 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19159/?]Mens Underwear replacer [/url]
neovinci â€“ meshes,
and BaronDavid - textures.
Apachii for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Hair[/url]
Hvergelmir for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
Barneq for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34395/?]Ancient falmer armor retexture[/url]
luddemann for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33213/?]Falmer Mage Armor[/url]
Hallgarth for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54059/?]Snow Elf Race mod[/url]
My dear friend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1932308/?]Aisaka[/url] for testing and screenshots.
Erik for HighPoly Heads
[img]http://s020.radikal.ru/i719/1408/ac/85eed8066262.png[/img][/center]
author: Nightshade

files.name: Lester Snow Elf Follower_Eng
files.changelogHtml:
Removed warpaint because it didn't look right.

Reworked the face textures.

Most of the spells were customized. His spells no longer cause damage to player.

Summoned monsters no longer attack the player.

Added staff with custom enchantment which doesn't apply to player too.

With 100 Conjuration skill Lester can summon a unique Frost Atronach. The Atronach cannot be summoned in interiors. Both the Atronach and a Wraiths can be summoned at the same time while outdoors.

Added Waterwalking ability.

Various minor fixes

Cleaned the mod with TES5Edit.
